<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataGH extends data { const CODE = 'GH'; const PREFIX = 233; const REGION = 'Africa'; const PATTERNS = array( '(?:[235]\d{3}|800)\d{5}', ); const TYPES = array( '3(?:[167]2[0-6]|22[0-5]|32[0-3]|4(?:2[013-9]|3[01])|52[0-7]|82[0-2])\d{5}|3(?:[0-8]8|9[28])0\d{5}|3(?:0[237]|[1-9]7)\d{6}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '(?:2[0346-8]\d|5(?:[0457]\d|6[01]|9[1-6]))\d{6}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '800\d{5}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d{3})(\d{5})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d{2})(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2 $3', ); }
